channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 best supplements to support your mental health, according to a psychiatrist
item.description: Supplements may help you along your mental health journey; they are not a cure.

item.title: Cramer's week ahead: Labor report, plus GitLab and CrowdStrike earnings
item.description: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Friday told investors what to pay attention to next week on Wall Street.

item.title: Autodesk shares rally as internal audit eases accounting concern
Romance guild in upheaval following criticism over the way it handled an author who posted negative online comments about other writers
item.description: The group also faced criticism and withdrew an award for a book that included a sympathetic portrayal of a cavalry officer who participated in the slaughter of Lakota Indians.

item.title: Binance's ex-CEO begins prison sentence in California
item.description: Binance's billionaire founder Changpeng Zhao has reported to a low-security federal prison in Lompoc, California.

item.title: Dow’s 575-point Friday surge puts finishing touch on year’s best month
A former tech CEO announced a fake offer to buy Getty Images in order to boost its stock price, authorities say
item.description: Robert Scott Murray, former chief executive of the networking-equipment maker 3Com, sold his Getty stock for about $1.5 million, officials said.

item.title: Salesforce is the most oversold stock on Wall Street amid a losing week for the markets
item.description: CNBC Pro screened for the most overbought and oversold names on Wall Street this week.

item.title: Can a felon get a commercial real-estate loan?
The best science-backed strategies for a strong mind as you age
item.description: The lifelong learner is onto something.

item.title: Retailers like Gap and Foot Locker had a strong week. That doesn’t spell a consumer comeback
item.description: Gap profits were 9 times higher and Foot Locker beat estimates — unlikely winners in Q1 retail earnings. But, this says more about the companies than consumers.

item.title: Boston Beer's stock rockets after WSJ report of talks to sell to Jim Beam parent
Billionaire Bill Ackman is about to get $4 billion richer as his hedge fund Pershing Square expects a funding round at a premium valuation
item.description: Pershing Square could go public as soon as 2025.

item.title: Warren Buffett is worried about potential for 'huge losses' in booming, but tiny insurance market
item.description: Warren Buffett recently warned that cybersecurity insurance risks are getting overlooked as agents rush to sign up clients and 'huge losses' could be ahead.

item.title: Why stock-market gains seen after April’s PCE inflation report faded so fast
